CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(Grant_Start_Date__c), TEXT(MONTH(Start_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(DAY(Start_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(YEAR(Start_Date__c)), TEXT(MONTH(Grant_Start_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(DAY(Grant_Start_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(YEAR(Grant_Start_Date__c))) & ' - ' & IF(ISBLANK(Grant_End_Date__c), TEXT(MONTH(End_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(DAY(End_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(YEAR(End_Date__c)), TEXT(MONTH(Grant_End_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(DAY(Grant_End_Date__c)) & '/' & TEXT(YEAR(Grant_End_Date__c)))
CustomField.label: Date Range
